ComicInfo.Summary:
In this issue:
"Fringe: Angels Drop Dead" by Paul Tobin, Fredd Gorham and Phillip 'Phil' Hester
"Blow" by Rafael Nieves and Chas Truog
"Random Thoughts: Part Five" by Stephen Csutoras, Craig Gassen and Stefano Gaudiano
"Caliber Sketchbook: Jim O'Barr"
"Orlak the Eternal: Act Three: Ghost Town" by Ken Holewczynski and Rafael Nieves
"Fusion" by Mel Taylor and R. G. Taylor
"Down to the Sea" by Gene Day, Dan Day and Debra J. Hetherington
"Caliber Bonus: The Crow #5 (Preview)" by James O'Barr
